A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Expect the unexpected! Many people seem to have expected it to go exactly the direction they thought it would go\, however it gives mind blowing plot twists that keep some on the edge of their seat not knowing what to expect. Beautifully directed with scenes that leave you in awe and very well done writing with a delightful dash of comedy. Its everything I never knew I wanted in a star wars movie.
